thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: George Papadimitriou
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 George Papadimitriou

author: George Papadimitriou
title: George Papadimitriou
text: I have recenlty bought a mobile phone (Vernee Apollo Lite) from Topmtop. Before i decide to choose that site i have read some negative reviews over the internet and a was a little worried but the phone was on a super low price that i couldn't resist. I decided to receive phone from Germany warehouse, i paid my order by a credit card and i picked the expedited shipping method. What i have to say after my experience with Tomtop is that it is a trustworthy site! My phone came on time, it was propered packed and in a perfect condition as it had to be. My transaction with cretid card was secure with no trouble. I am shopping from online shops very often and i have nothing negative to say comparing to other sites. I will think again Toptop in the future if i decide to buy anything they can offer!
